title: Friendlier Customer Experience
description: We've made the shopping experience warmer and more helpful. Error messages now feel like they're from a friend, not a robot.
benefit: A more human touch throughout checkout. When something goes wrong, you'll get helpful guidance instead of technical jargon.

changes.why: Helpful guidance instead of technical jargon when something goes wrong
Cleaner display with better spacing and item details
Positive reinforcement when orders complete successfully
Better readability and touch targets on phones

howToUse: Browse the shop and add items to your cart
Complete checkout to see the improved flow
